content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: James Smith

content: Hello James Smith, thank you for coming to see the apartment. What is your position on the rental price?
name: James Smith

content: I would like to see the apartment before we discuss the price. Is that possible?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Yes, that is possible. Would you like to schedule a time to view the apartment or do you have any other questions?
name: James Smith

content:
I would like to schedule a time to view the apartment. How about tomorrow at 10:00 AM?

Also, I have a question regarding the bathroom. Is it a shared bathroom or is it a private bathroom?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Sounds good, I will schedule a viewing for tomorrow at 10:00 AM. As for the bathroom, it is a shared bathroom with one other tenant.
name: James Smith
